text: Haldummulla () is a town in the Badulla District, Uva Province, Sri Lanka.Divisional Secretariats Herbal gardens A landslide damaged a large part of the town in 2014. == Places == * Bambarakanda Falls * Ohiya and Horton Plains via Kalupahana and Udaweriya Estate === Portuguese Fort === Portugal created a fort made of stone in the 1600s. It is also known as the Katugodalla fort. It was used to block invasions. Only the foundations of the fort are still there. The fort was named a Archaeological Protected Monument in November 2002. == References == Category:Settlements in Sri Lanka Category:Towns in Asia
title: Haldummulla
